mapper.insert: insert into tbl_chatroom (roomname, player1, player2, progress, bid) values (#{roomname}, #{player1}, #{player2}, #{progress}, #{bid})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_chatroom where player1=#{uid} or player2=#{uid}
select count(cid) from tbl_chat where isread='n' and roomname=#{roomname} and writer != #{writer}
mapper.update: update tbl_chatroom set progress=#{progress} where bid=#{bid}
mapper.select: select roomname,count(cid) from tbl_chat where isread='y' and writer != 'TEST1' group by roomname
